summary: Implements a PDF backend that leverages the PDFium engine (via pypdfium2) to load PDF documents, render pages as images, and extract structured text layout information such as cells, rows, and bounding boxes. It encapsulates document‑level validation, page counting, and resource cleanup, while the page backend handles bitmap generation, region retrieval, text cell detection, row grouping and cell merging.
business_intent: Provides the core functionality required to convert PDF files into machine‑readable visual and textual representations, supporting downstream tasks like OCR, data extraction, document indexing, and AI‑driven content analysis.
